wikipedia_page.main: The Greechans are a family of bowls players from Jersey. Both Lindsey Greechan and Thomas Greechan, wife and husband, compete both indoor and outdoor, as does their daughter Chloe Greechan. Thomas, Lindsey and Helen (Thomas' mother) are all British champions while Thomas, Lindsey and Chloe have all won the IIBC Championships on at least one occasion each. Lindsey, Thomas and Helen have also represented Jersey at the Commonwealth Games.
